• Deployed multiple applications across various environments.
  • Utilized containerization tools (Docker) for application management.
  • Managed over two hundred virtual machines to support diverse workloads.

• Provided printing, graphic design, and digital marketing services.
  • Created 200+ illustrations and 100+ business cards.

  • Coordinated meetings and tracked sales.
